"Pretty good, really."

"Have you had any problems?"

"Nothing really. The school accepted the excuse, and the kids bought it hook, line and sinker. I feel quite healthy, and apart from going to the toilet at the end of every lesson it's been great!"

"Frequent urination is normal, although I will need to run some tests on that too."

"More tests?" he groaned.

Alice laughed. "Just you wait until you see what else I will be testing. So, have you noticed any growth today?"

"None that I could tell. Compared to the last couple of days it seems to have stopped completely."

"Good. This may buy us some time. We have a lot to achieve between now and birth time. Not only are there the usual preparations and examinations, we also have to come up with story as to where the baby came from. Given how quickly a panties baby can come to term we are going to have our work cut out for us. Now, as soon as you two are done eating I want you upstairs doing your homework. Being pregnant is no excuse for you letting your grades slip. "

And so the afternoon continued more or less normally, with the two teenagers completing their homework, sometimes together and sometimes individually. The work was punctuated a few times by Janet resting her hand on Tim's belly when he reported the baby was moving.

When their work was done, they found themselves at a loose end. Tim was not allowed to climb to the treehouse, and he had been forbidden from anything sporting or rough play for the time being. They filled a little time by playing with his belly, which soon had Tim regretting they had been ordered not to have sex for the time being. He was feeling quite excited, and his erection was visible even through the larger shorts.

Janet smiled and told him that they needed to find other clothes that would fit him.

"Such as?" he asked cautiously.

"Mom has a lot of maternity wear, and you're about her size. You should try some on."

"I realise it is getting hard to find boy's clothes to fit me, but women's clothes?"

"Maternity wear. Pregnancy clothes. Just in case you had not noticed, you're pregnant. You should at least give it a shot."

"Won't your mother mind? Yesterday was an emergency, but I can't imagine she will be happy with me wearing her clothes."

"She'll be fine. Children wear their parent's clothes sometimes when they are a similar size. It would be like me wearing her clothes."

"You don't wear girl clothes. You would be more likely to wear your Dad's stuff."

"Okay, tell you what. You try on some of the maternity clothes, and I will try them on as well."

"Really?" Tim asked in surprise.

"Really really."

This was starting to sound like an offer too good to refuse. He was not keen on wearing women's clothes, but it might be worth it to his his friend dressing girly for a change.

111322111112111111.content:
"I guess if we are both wearing them it will be okay," Tim told her a little reluctantly.

"Great," Janet said, launching for the bedroom door. "I'll be right back."

Tim sat heavily on Janet's bed and worried what he had allowed himself to get into. Janet soon returned with a small pile of clothes in her arms. She dropped them unceremoniously on the bed beside him. She handed him a denim garment.

"Try that on," she instructed, picking up a bright yellow dress and placing it over the back of her chair. She began undoing the buttons on her uniform shirt.

Tim sighed and stood awkwardly. Unfastening his shorts he let them fall to the floor, and stepped out of the shorts into the denim jeans he had been given. As he pulled them up he realised that where the zipper should be they had a patch of blue stretchy fabric, which allowed the jeans to fit snugly around his belly. Once they were in place he unbuttoned his shirt and dropped it onto his shorts. He picked up a t-shirt from the pile, a white garment emblazoned with the words, "Does my bump look big in this?" He shrugged and pulled it over his head. Now fully dressed he turned to Janet and was surprised by what he saw. The short-haired girl looked amazing in the yellow sun-dress which draped neatly over her youthful figure. Normally her shape was hidden beneath her uniform or wrapped up in boys clothes, but now she was clearly a lovely girl well on the way to womanhood. Tim could feel himself getting hard just looking at the change in her appearance.

"How do I look?" she asked him.

"Wow," was all that he could manage.

"Well, if that is the best you can manage," Janet retorted, "I can see that I will have to wear this more often."

Tim relaxed. For a second there he had thought that he was in trouble.

"Th..that would be great," he managed to stammer. Janet beamed at him.

They were interrupted by a knock at the door. They both looked up to see Alice standing in the doorway, some clothes in her hand.

"I am sorry to interrupt," Janet's mother said as she waddled into the room, "but Tom will be home soon, and he is going to take Tim through some exercises."

"Excercises?" Tim asked, confused. While he was happy to be active he was never fond of actual exercise or sport. "How come?"

"That belly of yours is going to be a lot heavier," Alice explained. She pressed her own gravid belly into his for emphasis. "Trust me on that." She thrust her hips forward and her belly sent Tim falling backwards onto Janet's bed.
"You ought to build up some muscle to compensate for the weight you are going to gain. It is not vital, but you will be a lot better off if you do. Besides," she added with a grin, "I am not going to give you a choice."
She handed him the clothes in her hand. "You will need to wear these." Then she turned and waddled towards the door. As she reached the door she turned back and faced the pair.
"Oh, and you look sweet in that outfit," she added warmly. "Both of you." And then she was gone.

Janet laughed lightly. "See, I told you that she would not mind," she told him as she helped him onto his feet.

"That you did," he said, waddling over to the mirror. He gazed at his reflection in the mirror. The outfit did not look too girly, and it fit well around his swollen form. Perhaps this would not be so bad.



Soon afterwards he met Janet's father Tom in the basement where he kept a small collection of gym equipment. He was now wearing a white singlet and a pair of Spiderman boxer shorts. The singlet clung to his tiny but swollen body, and the elastic of the shorts held firmly to Tim's waistline. Tom had already changed into a grey t-shirt and matching sports shorts.

"Ah, good," Tom announced as he spotted Tim walking down the stairs, "you're here."

"Thank you for the clothes," Tim began. "I am told they were yours."

"Well, they were. Looks like those shorts fit you better than they did me. Don't let anyone ever tell you that Spiderman is not cool."

"Oh, I won't."

"Good. Now, I understand congratulations are in order."

"I guess so. The baby is a bit of a surprise, but everyone is taking it well."

"Ah yes, congratulations on the baby as well. I actually meant to congratulate you on having sex with my daughter."

Tim paled. "Am I in trouble?"

"Not at all," Tom reassured him. "I knew Janet would get around to it eventually, and I am glad that it was with you. However, I must warn you not to hurt her or abuse whatever relationship you two have going."

"Actually I think Janet has greater capacity to hurt me than I do to her," the boy said cautiously.

"That's why I am warning you," Tom grinned. "Oh, and keep using protection. One baby is enough for now."

"I am sure we will."

"Excellent. Now, what we are going to do today is get some idea of what you are capable. Just some light work, nothing too strenuous. I am under strict orders not to put that baby at risk. You are going to need stronger arms and legs, both during and after this pregnancy, and anything we can do to improve your back and abdominal muscles will help you as well."

And so the lesson continued. Tim performed better at the weights than Tom had expected, though not as good as Janet could do. He struggled with the exercise routines, but mostly though lack of experience. Tom assured him that would improve with practice.


After half an hour of training Tom sent the boy to go and shower, and Tim fled the basement gratefully. He still was not keen on this exercise.

With difficulty he kept his shower brief, wanting very badly to enjoy the feel of the water on his swollen belly. Part way through the shower Janet entered the bathroom and announced that she was leaving him some clothes on the counter. After he had stepped out of the shower and dried off he found that it was the maternity clothes he had worn earlier, along with a pair of plain white girl's panties. He sighed and put all the provided garments on, and tried not to feel too embarrassed when he went downstairs.

Janet, still wearing the yellow sundress, was busy setting the dining table, and Alice was putting the last touches on dinner. Janet looked up as Tim waddled into the room.
"Your mother called while you were in the shower," she told him.

"She said that she would be here in time for dinner."

"But first," announced Alice, walking into the room, "Tim needs to come into my office and be measured. Janet, please tell your father that he gets to serve dinner."

"But I was measured last night," objected Tim, confused.

"You're a special case," Alice explained, gently pushing him from the room and down the hall in the direction of her office. "We need to keep a close watch on how fast you are growing." She let the pregnant boy into her office, a cosy little room with a desk, a bookcase lining one wall, and an examination bench for patients. First he was weighed, then at her instruction he pulled the jeans down to his groin, lifted his shirt up and lay on the bench. It was a quick examination - Alice measured the height and width of the bulge in his belly as best as she could, had a quick listen to the baby's heartbeat, then told him that he could go. As he clambered down from the bench he heard his mother's voice from the doorway.

"How's the patient?"

"Well," replied Alice, writing in her little notepad, "he would appear to be pregnant. There is no detectable gain from yesterday. How close are we to getting more accurate results?"

As Tim walked up the hallway he heard the conversation fading from earshot. "I have the wand here, and I'll set it up tonight. The rest ..." He could make out no more after that. He was not exactly sure what they were up to, but he figured he would find out soon enough.


Dinner was uneventful, with conversation covering how school or work had been. Tim was somewhat surprised that no-one made a fuss over him wearing maternity wear. Then again, he supposed, he WAS pregnant. Maternity wear came with the territory. They did not make much fuss over him being pregnant either, other than ensuring that the baby was okay, and being pregnant was not normal for a boy.

After dinner they sat in the lounge room while Tom stacked the dishwasher.

"You've both been very patient," Tina began as soon as they were comfortable, "waiting for me to explain what I know about the panties. We really did not have time before now, and I needed some time to figure out how I was going to tell you."

She paused as if she was still uncertain how to begin.

"As you know I am an only child. My parents, wonderful people though they were, had been unable to have children. The time for my mother to carry a child came and went without her managing to conceive. They were devastated. If anyone deserved a child it was them and they had been denied this."

"So how did you ..." Tim began, but was silenced by a wave of her hand.

"One day my mother did a favour for a strange old lady, who repaid her kindness by offering her the children she so desired. She gave my mother the purple panties, and told her that if she had sex with her husband while wearing them she would conceive his child. Naturally my mother did not believe this, but she tried it anyway. Obviously it worked, for here I am today."

"But I did not have sex until after I was definitely pregnant."

"No, and that is where it gets complicated. The old woman warned my mother only to wear the panties while having sex. She said wearing them too long would cause a pregnancy that would not be his child, and that wearing them while pregnant would make the baby grow quickly. So my mother wore them only the once, and when she knew that she was pregnant with me she put them away in case she every needed them again. She told my father what the woman had said about the panties, but she never told him where they were. Sadly, she was never able to use them again. My parents were both in their sixties when I was born, and Mom died when I was little."

Tina reflected on her loss for a few seconds before marshalling the strength to go on.

"When I was sixteen I found the panties. I did not know what they were, or why they were packed away, but it seemed like a good idea to try them on. They felt so good to wear they became my favorite underwear. Every few days, as soon as they had come through the wash I was wearing them again. I did not notice at the time that they did not need cleaning, so I would wear them for about ten hours every few days. It was a week before I noticed that I was gaining weight. I had a slender frame, not much different from now, really, and it was fairly obvious that all the weight was in a growing bulge in my belly. I was a virgin, so I knew I could not be pregnant, and I felt fine, so I adopted a wait and see attitude."

Tom came in from the kitchen and sat on the couch next to his pregnant wife. She cosied up to him, and Tina waited while they made themselves comfortable.

"Over the next week," she finally continued, "the bulge grew larger and firmer. Not steadily - it seemed to go through growth spurts - but it was definitely getting larger within me. Dad's eyesight was going and he had not noticed yet, but I knew it was only a matter of time before he did."

"I noticed," added Alice.

Tina nodded. "Tom and Alice had been living next door to us for a few years by then, having moved in when they were expecting their first baby." She glanced at Janet and smiled. "I had chatted over the fence to Alice from time to time, and I knew that she worked as a nurse. I was not keen to see a doctor at that time, but a female neighbour with some medical experience seemed a good place to start."

"She took her sweet time," interjected Alice. "I had known for a week before she said anything."

"I was nervous. It was not until one growth spurt brought with it some fidgeting from within the bulge in my belly that I finally forced myself to go and see Alice and ask her if what was happening to me was normal."

"I told her it was if she was pregnant," Alice added. "She told me that was impossible. I had her bare her belly for me and I felt what was obviously a growing uterus. I was only a general nurse at the time, but I had worked on the labor ward enough to know a pregnant belly when I had my hands on one. So I told her that impossible or not it was happening. Unsurprisingly she did not believe me, so I did not press the issue and waited for the truth to be more obvious to her."

Tina nodded. "I was back a few days later and larger than before. The movements in my belly was more pronounced, and it did feel like something kicking inside of me. I had to admit that I did look and feel pregnant. Even Dad was starting to hint that there might be something I needed to tell him. I figured that I would find out for certain before I talked to him about it, so I went to see Alice again. I still wasn't willing to see a doctor, but at least I was willing to discuss it with a friendly neighbour."

"By then I was ready for her," continued Alice. "Back then we did not have over-the-counter pregnancy test kits, but I had collected a test from work and brought it home for her. It hardly seemed necessary, given that she looked five months pregnant, but it was best to remove all doubt. No prizes for guessing what the result was."

"Well, I could not deny it," sighed Tina. "I was definitely pregnant, but I remained adamant that I was a virgin. Alice asked if she could examine me properly. I was a bit awkward about it, but I agreed."

"Like mother - like son," chuckled Alice. "Unlike the normal practice I did not allow her to undress while I was out of the room. I decided that this needed a more delicate touch, and that gradual disrobing would be easier on her. So she stripped down to her bra and panties and lay on the couch. This was the first time that I saw the purple panties. She was wearing them the day she finally admitted that she was pregnant!"
"I was no expert, but having been pregnant and some experience at the hospital was enough to fudge it. I listened to the baby's heartbeat, and felt her belly and breasts. Her breasts did not seem swollen or tender at all, and still fit snugly in a bra she had obviously had for a while, but her belly was quite swollen. I took measurements as best as I could remember how it was done and noted them for future reference. I also checked that she had been telling the truth about being a virgin. Then I let her get dressed again. She had a good cry on my shoulder, and we discussed the needs of her and the baby, and her options for the future."

"Obviously I chose to keep the baby," Tina picked up the story. "Even if I wanted to it was far too late for an abortion, and I was not able to bring myself to adopt the baby out. Telling Dad was hard, but he took it well. He said he was disappointed but he was supportive of me. He also said that after the lengths he and Mom had been to in order to have a child perhaps it was fitting that I should fall pregnant so easily. I did not tell him right away that I was still a virgin. Just telling him that I was going to have a baby was hard enough."

"After all I had been through that day I was too tired to change properly for bed, and slept in the bra and panties I had been wearing all day. When I woke up I was sure that I was bigger, and there was no way to hide this belly at school so I begged Dad to tell the school I was sick. He let me stay home, and I spent most of the day resting, and though I did not realise it at first, growing bigger."

"She came to see me that afternoon in a panic," Alice continued. "She was only wearing a crop top and low-cut shorts and it was obvious that she had grown larger since yesterday. I had her strip down to her underwear and examined her once more. I noted that she was still wearing the same panties, but I had no reason to suspect they were the cause of her condition. I tried to reassure her that it was not unusual to have growth spurts during pregnancy, which was when she told me that she had been having one every few days for the last three weeks. The only difference had been a continuous growth over the last two days."

"I did not know what to make of it. A multiple pregnancy might have explained her rapid growth but it seemed unlikely. I urged her to go to the hospital to check it out properly, but she would not have it. I even offered to take her, but it did no good. I could not force her, so I assured her that I would help as best as I could, or at least as much as she would let me."

"It was good to know that Alice would help me, but I did not know what she could do for me. I went home, hoping that if I just had some time to myself to think it over I would work out what I could do. Shortly after arriving home it occurred to me that I had been wearing the same underwear for nearly two days and I needed to freshen up. When I undressed in front of the bathroom mirror I realised three things. Although I had been wearing them for a long time the panties were still fresh and clean, as though they had never been worn. Standing in front of the mirror I could see that although my belly looked obviously pregnant, the rest of my body was unchanged. There was no extra padding or swelling, no stretch marks - nothing! Apart from the belly, I looked pretty good naked."

"So what was the third thing?" asked Janet.

"I did not want to be a virgin when I gave birth." Tina smiled wryly. "Normally sex leads to pregnancy, but in this case being pregnant led to me having sex. I had originally intended to wait until I was much older like a good girl, but I was not prepared to pass a baby through an orifice that had never been used properly. I'll spare you the details, but I was able to find someone who was kind enough to overlook the circumstances and give me what I needed. We did it a few times over the next two days without incident, but the next time turned out to be different."

Tina paused. "Even now, it seems unbelievable, and I was there. It was enough to make me put the panties away and forget about them. It wasn't that it was bad, just bizarre, and not something I dared to risk again."

"I had been having another growth day, still unaware that the panties were the cause. I'll admit that I was intensely worried about what was happening to me, but it was strangely enjoyable as well. It felt good to have this new life growing inside of me, even if it was happening so quickly. On top of that I had just discovered how wonderful it felt to have a man inside me, and I was keen to have more of that while I could. I had been hanging around the house all day dressed only in my nightie and my favorite pair of panties when he came to me. I did not hesitate. I pounced on him and dragged him to the nearby couch, tearing his pants off him as fast as I could. Taking my clothes off would have taken too long - I mounted him still wearing my nightie and panties. It was a wonderful experience, even better than before, and I did not notice that my belly was growing faster than ever straight away. At first I was not sure, but I seemed heavier and it was harder to move, but soon it was obvious that I was getting larger. It felt too good, and I did not want to stop. I kept going until I felt the weight inside of me being pushed down through my pelvis. It did not hurt at all, but it was getting awkward to move. I came as the baby's head passed through my cervix and nestled in my birth canal, forcing my lover out of me. With him out the panties slipped back into place. The contractions stopped, and I found myself squatting over the couch with a baby's head parked in my vagina."

"I was confused. I knew next to nothing about birth, but I was sure they did not take a break at this stage."

"Fortunately I was home," Alice spoke up, "when Tina's father ran over looking for help for his daughter. Tom wasn't home at the time, so I brought Janet with me. I was as quick as I could, but I am sure Tina had been stranded mid-birth for several minutes before I arrived. Apparantly she had not moved at all from where she started giving birth. She was in a squatting position over the couch and larger than I had last seen her. She told me that the baby had not moved for some minutes. Pulling up her nightie I saw the panties in the way and knew they had to be removed. She was in no position to take them off so I grabbed a pair of scissors and tried to cut them off, but the blades could not make a mark on the fabric. I tried a few places but they could not be cut. I had to work around them, so I pulled them aside as best as I could to see where she was up to and watched the head crown."

"I let the panties go, knowing that I had until the next contraction to get the towel I had brought under her. In my haste I dropped it and by the time I had it in place I realised that the contraction still had not happened. Although she was crowning I did not want to pull the panties aside until the start of the next contraction, but it was not coming. I was out of my depth. I gingerly reached my fingers under the panties and drew them aside. The head lurched forward into the outside world. I quickly slipped my spare hand under the baby's head and waited for the next push. It came quickly, and I had to let the panties go so I could catch the baby falling out of his mother."

She looked at Tim with a softness in her eyes. "And thus you were born."

"Wow," breathed Tim.

"You're not kidding," said his friend.

"After I cut the cord I sat Janet down on the couch with you on her lap under your grandfather's guidance so I could finish the job with Tina. You two have literally been together since Tim was born. It's almost poetic."

"And that," added Tom, "was what inspired my darling spouse to become a midwife."

"I think," said Tim, finally able to find the words he needed, "that this was more detail than most children get from their parents, but obviously I needed to know all of that." He looked at his mother. "So that's why you always dodged any questions about my father."

Tina nodded. "The truth was you did not have one. I really am a sole parent. That's why you and I are so much alike. And now the same thing that happened to me is happening to you. This time, however, Alice and I have some idea of what is going on."

"I get it," Janet announced. "The sex ban. The daily measurements. The confiscation of the panties. It all makes sense now."

"That's right," her mother agreed. "We have made a lot of guesses based on last time, but we need to know exactly what is going on before we risk any surprises. As far as we know Tim's pregnancy will only progress while he is wearing the panties, or at least it will happen in real time. That's why we've been pushing to get a portable ultrasound scanner set up here. We want to be able to measure the baby on a daily basis to chart any changes in growth or development. THEN we might start risking some rapid growth. For the purposes of research of course." She smiled knowingly.

"Of course," agreed Janet with a grin. "Research."

"So, do we have any idea how long I am going to be pregnant for?"

"It's too early to tell," said Alice. "Depending on whether it has stopped or slowed, anywhere from days to forever."

"Forever?"

"Well, if wearing the panties is the only thing that makes the pregnancy advance, then if you don't wear the panties you might stay that way. If all they did was speed it up then Tina may be a grandparent in three or four months."

"A grandparent?" Tina burst out. "I did not think of that. I'm too young to be a grandmother!"

"Oh, if I had a dollar for every time I heard that," Alice laughed. Tina groaned.

"Well, it's getting late," announced Tina. "I had better install those drivers on your laptop and then take my babymaker home."

The grownups left Tim and Janet alone. They stood and held each other close.

"So, you've been looking after me my whole life," Tim remarked, resting his head on her shoulder.

"Looks that way," she replied gently, wrapping her arm around his waist and pressing his belly into hers.

"Well, I hope you'll be there for me for the rest of it as well."

"I hope so too, kiddo. I hope so too."

As Tim and his mother walked back to their home the boy found a thought was nagging him.

"So, if I don't have a father, does that make me genetically all you, like a clone or something?"

"Something like that," his mother replied as she opened the green door at the front of their house. "We're just guessing, but you seem to be what I would have been if I were born a boy."

They walked inside and up the stairs.

"How is that possible?" Tim asked. "You have no Y chromosomes to pass on to me to make me male."

Tina chuckled. "You've become noticeably pregnant in mere days, and you question what is possible? We don't know what those panties can and cannot do, but impossible seems to be irrelevant." She kissed him lightly on the forehead. "Now, my little man, you need to go to bed. You and your baby both need your sleep."

"Yes, Mum." He turned to go to his room, then paused. "Mum?"

"Yes, sweetie?"

"Are you mad at me for getting pregnant?"

"No," she sighed. "You've complicated matters, and Alice and I are having to work very hard to sort this out, but you did not know what you were dealing with. There's some very serious consequences to your actions, but if you work with us on this we will do everything we can to help you and your baby."

"Thank you Mum. I love you Mom."

"I love you too, little man. Now off to bed."

Tim did as he was told. He brushed his teeth then went to his room to change out of the maternity wear into his pajamas. Crawling into bed he was quickly asleep.



Gentle shaking roused him. "Wake up sleepyhead!"

He opened his eyes and saw Janet sitting on the edge of his bed.

"Is it morning already?"

" 'Fraid so. Look on the bright side. This is the last day of school before the weekend. Come on, up you get."

Tim threw off the covers and with Janet's help stood up. He did not need the help yet, but he appreciated it all the same. It was still odd trying to move with a solid mass in his abdomen. He began peeling off his pajama shirt.

"Hulk pajamas today, I see," his friend noted.

"Yeah. I've always liked the Hulk. An ordinary guy who can grow larger. How could I not like that?"

"Well, now you're growing larger too," Janet grinned.

"I know, right?" Tim smiled, feeling his body react to her words. "It's kind of scary and awesome all at once."

"Well, I am here for you," she told him, handing him his uniform shirt. "You can get as big as you like, I am with you all the way."

Tim felt himself blushing. "I love you Janet."

"I love you too, kiddo. I always have."


As soon as he had dressed and had breakfast they left the house and walked to school. It seemed odd not to be running, but Tim really wasn't up to it now.
Perhaps when he became used to the extra weight in his belly he might be up to more vigorous activity, but for now he felt safest just walking.

They made it to school in plenty of time, and the day progressed more or less normally. Tim found it difficult to concentrate on his schoolwork, as he was frequently distracted by his belly bumping into furniture, or the weight throwing off his balance. Sometimes the baby would move inside of him, and he would stop what he was doing and put a hand on his belly and marvel at the miracle going on in his body.

Lunch time came and went with but one minor incident. Gwendolyn referred to him as "Tumour Boy", and Julie proceeded to berate her. Tim smiled as they went away arguing and thought nothing more of it until someone sat across the table from him.

"Don't think I am being friendly," Julie told him matter-of-factly. "I am sitting here to annoy Gwendolyn. I don't approve of the way she spoke to you, and she might get the point if she thinks I would rather sit with a dweeb like you."

"I'm not fussed," Tim told her in a conciliatory fashion. "As long as you are not mean to me, you are welcome to sit here."

"Well, good," insisted the girl as though suddenly unsure of her position. "I should be able to sit where I like."

"Suits me fine," Tim told her, and continued working at his substantial lunch.

"You know, you're eating a lot lately."

Tim shrugged. "My tumour demands a lot from me. If I do not keep it well fed I will suffer from malnourishment. The doctor says I need to keep eating to compensate." The lie came easily, 'though it was not far from the truth.

"It must be awful having that thing growing inside of you."

"You have no idea," he told her. "I have to eat more, and all I get in return is feeling tired and heavy."

"It almost sounds like you are pregnant."

"Almost. That would probably be easier to cope with. Such a shame that boys cannot get pregnant." He continued to shovel food into his mouth between replies and hoped that he looked like he had not been spooked by her comment.

"Just as well, really. Eventually they are going to cut that thing out of you, and you don't have a baby to look after when it's over."

Suddenly she wondered if this would be an issue. Suppose somebody was on the elevator. After a few minutes of thought she decided to take the stairs. It was quite a feat. Normally she would have bound down the stairs in no time; now she slowly went step by step, barely able to see her feet past her big belly.

Kelly made it to the second floor, huffing and puffing. She started down the set of stairs to the first floor when she heard some voices on the stairs below. Oh boy, she thought, it’s the Evans’. They were a nice elderly couple that lived in the unit below her. They also liked to pry into her private life; asking her about her marriage plans and the like. Needless to say her current gravid condition would be a bit much to explain. She waddled heavily down to the end of the hall; hoping no one would step out of their units at this time of day. The Evans made it up to the hallway, Mrs. Evans chattering away about something to do with her sister. Kelly noticed they were carrying groceries; she started to move out of the corner toward the stairs when she heard Mrs. Evans

“Joe” she barked, “did you get everything out of the car?”

“Ahhh...yes I did” Mr. Evans replied meekly.

The Evans closed the door to their apartment. Kelly heaved a sigh a relief and slowly but deliberately moved her big bellied body to the stairs to the first floor. She began to work her way downstairs and made it to the first floor. Waddling to the front door she stepped out and looked around. No one in sight. She padded down the path to the parking area and was just about to go through the gate when she heard something that made her skin go cold.

“Kelly!!” called the voice, “Kelly!!”

It was her friend Cathy Bryant. Actually friend may not be the best description. Cathy and Kelly had worked together at an ad agency and Cathy had left to go work for someone else but had moved into the same apartment complex as Kelly. They occasionally socialized and helped each other on different projects. Kelly quickly stepped behind the gate to the parking area and closed it. The gate came up to her nose so if she stood close enough to it perhaps Cathy wouldn’t see Kelly’s rather difficult to explain condition.

“Hi, Kelly,” Cathy said, rather cheerily,” How are you?”

“I’m …fine” said Kelly, pushing her big bellied body as close as possible to the gate,” How’s things with you?”

“I’m good, Kelly” Cathy replied,” I’ve been really busy” Cathy tried peeking over the gate but couldn’t see anything. Looking a little puzzled as to why Kelly was standing so close to the gate she went on, “but I had a question for you about something I’m working on. You know that sketch I was doing for the agency that I showed you. Do you have a few minutes? I’d like to show it to you and see what you think.”

“Ahh, Cathy” began Kelly carefully, “but…I’m in a bit of rush. My sister and I want to go maternity clothes shopping this afternoon.”

“Both of you?” said Cathy, “but I thought she was the one having the….didn’t you say triplets?”

Kelly stopped. Somehow she had to get this under control. Again Cathy peered over the gate but couldn’t see Kelly’s big body. There was an awkward pause. Finally Kelly said, “Ah yeah, of course, she’s having the triplets” Feeling a little more confident, “You know what I mean….don’t you?”

Cathy hesitated, “Sure, I do. Will you call me later?”

“Yes, I will, Cathy. I’ll call you when OOOOHHHH…” Kelly stopped on a dime. One of the babies just gave her a kick that would shake a mountain. The kick tapped an emotional part of Kelly and tears began to flow.

“Kelly!!” said Cathy,” are you all right? Did something hurt you? Let me open the gate and help you”

“Cathy” said Kelly, wiping her eyes and regaining her composure,” I’m fine. It was just a kic…ah, gas pain. Look, I’d better go. I’ll call you later, OK?”

“All right” said Cathy,” Maybe I’ll come over”

“Yes, that would be…wait, I’ll see. Maybe we can do this by phone” replied Kelly quickly.

“All right,” now Cathy looked completely confused,” Take care and I’ll guess I’ll talk with you later.” Cathy started to walk away from the gate. A thought seemed to strike her and she turned around to see Kelly moving away from the gate. Cathy thought Kelly seemed to be moving strangely, like she was hurt or something. She started to walk toward the gate to get a closer look but her cell phone rang and stopped to answer it. Kelly turned to see Cathy standing fairly close to the gate so, as fast as she could move her hugely gravid body, she moved toward the other fence which shielded the cars. Peering over the fence she saw Cathy looking around after finishing her phone call Kelly padded to her car, as quickly as she could, opened the driver side door. She lowered herself into her seat and shifted the seat as far back as she could in order to accommodate her big bellied body. Kelly looked over her shoulder and saw Cathy coming through the gate. Kelly fumbled for her keys and started her car, pulled out of the space and took off for the driveway out of the complex. Kelly looked in her mirror and saw Cathy standing in the middle of parking lot looking a bit confused.
1221122.title: Kelly heads out into the world as a pregnant woman

12211221.content:
6

Kelly eased back into driver seat, confident that Cathy hadn’t seen her. She headed down the street toward the stop sign and made the turn onto the Jersey highway headed for the mall. As she did, however, she realized that the victories she had won were short term (wow, what a pun for this situation). She could run, or waddle, whatever the case may be, but there was no permanently hiding her condition or the situation she was in. As the thoughts came to her, the tears started to flow. What about an obstetrician? What about her family? How does somebody explain this? She had been working independently at home but did go to her office once a week and was responsible for presentations. Shoot, she had one coming up next week in St. Louis! Won’t she be a sight like this!!! The biggest question she had was, how far along was she?

Kelly pulled into the parking lot of the mall where the maternity shop was located. She got out and began her slow, laborious walk across the parking lot. After going through the front door she realized she had come in the wrong entrance and had left herself a longer walk. She stopped at one point to rest and dropped her big bellied body into a seat. After a few minutes she struggled to pull herself to her feet and was getting frustrated when she suddenly felt a friendly arm under her arm.

“Need a hand here?” said a soft male voice.

“Ah, that wouldn’t hurt” replied Kelly.

The tall stranger helped Kelly to her feet. He was a swarthy complexioned fellow standing about six feet plus. Kelly was immediately taken by his kindness and he seemed not note the patchwork nature of her clothing.

“How’s that?” said the stranger.

“Fine…thanks….what did you say your name was? “replied Kelly, feeling a little eager.
“My name’s Doug” replied the gentleman, “and yours is…?”

“Kelly” answered Kelly, feeling that maybe something good might be happening here.
“OK, Kelly, nice to meet you” answered Doug, “I do have to run. Good luck with your baby”

Kelly was about to blurt out her life story but Doug took off. Feeling a little crest fallen she continued her walk to the maternity store. Just then a mother and her child walked by.

Mommy, why is that lady so fat…?

She’s not fat, honey, she’s going to have a baby…or two…or three.. Once you were in my belly too.

OK, mommy, but shouldn’t she be wearing better clothes…

Well, yes….

Kelly stopped. The dream!!! It was like she was slowly realizing that something larger than herself (a hard thing to conceive) was going on here. She was now beginning to think a little more clearly.

As she was turning the corner toward the store she stopped short. Straight ahead, coming out of the maternity store was her sister. Damn, she had forgotten to tease out where Jen was going. Kelly stepped back, bumping into a couple coming out of the coffee shop. After frantic apologies she waited, praying that Jen wouldn’t come by the entrance to the coffee shop. Then she noticed that Jen was headed for the nearest entrance and Kelly, heaving a sigh of relief, moved out to the corridor.

Kelly waddled into the maternity store. The saleswoman caught a quick glimpse of her outfit and seemed to wince but came over to wait on her.

“May I help you?” said the saleswoman.

“Ah, I would like to buy some outfits and underwear ….basically the whole works” said Kelly, “I…. had some water damage in my condo and everything got wiped out”
The saleswoman seemed to go along with this and Kelly felt more confident about what she was about to do.

“OK, how far along are you?” said the saleswoman, being a bit friendlier.

“Ah” Kelly paused, she really didn’t know how far along she was, but forged ahead, “about…six months?”

The saleswoman looked a bit confused, “Six months…but you’re so….big?”

Kelly stopped and then blurted, “Oh, I’m having triplets…boy, do they take up a lot of room!!” and they also give a good kick as Kelly felt one right there.

The saleswoman nodded and wished her congratulations. She then showed Kelly to the multiples aisle. Kelly moved into the dressing room and removed her patchwork outfit. She stopped and looked at her body in the mirror. She was big, it almost looked as if her boobs had gotten bigger. Her belly was round and still fairly high up. The stretch marks were limited to the bottom. She was slowly becoming accustomed to this and with each little kick she felt more and more like…a mother to be.

Collecting herself she finished trying on the bras and underwear. Occasionally she would poke her head out the curtain and ask the saleswoman some questions and the saleswoman, with the look on her face of haven’t-you-done-any-shopping-for-maternity-wear before on her face, would patiently answer them. Kelly decided to see if she could wear one of the outfits out of the store, she just couldn’t stand the makeshift piece of garbage she wore into the store. Finally Kelly finished up and went to the register to pay.

It was there that things got…awkward.

“Do you have a sister?” said the saleswoman.

Kelly froze. Tentatively she answered “Ohh…no I don’t”

“That’s strange.” Continued the saleswoman, “ there was someone in here who looks a lot like you and she’s having triplets as well.”

“Oh, no one I know” said Kelly, a trace of nervousness in her voice,” of course maybe my looks are rather common.”

Kelly finished paying for her stuff, thanked the saleswoman and, as fast as she could move, left the store.


7

Kelly stepped outside. Fortunately she decided to change out of her make shift outfit into a comfortable maternity shirt and skirt. She felt better and started to head for the door when she heard the last thing she wanted to hear.

“Kelly!??!!” called a male voice.


Kelly shot a glance over her shoulder and saw her ex boyfriend Mark Tanis. Great, this is not good at all, she thought. Mark must have seen her from a distance. This would be too much to explain. Kelly started for the door but was moving too slow when Mark stepped around a group of people to cut her off.

“Hi, Kelly it’s good to see….uh” Mark started to speak but stopped cold looking at Kelly’s immensely pregnant body. There was a moment of awkward silence. Things hadn’t ended well between Kelly and Mark. Mark was a bit of a hot head who liked to drink so Kelly wasn’t terribly heart broken about the break up. He was good looking but a bit of an underachiever who trouble holding jobs. Kelly wasn’t sure how to react it had been a while since she had seen Mark so maybe she could skate by.

“Hi, Kelly” said Mark.

“Hi, Mark” said Kelly, her heart throbbing a bit.

“Ah, Kelly…when did you get married?” said Mark.

THE DREAM, AGAIN!!! Now she had to figure out what was going on here.

“I’m not married, Mark.” replied Kelly, firmly and suddenly feeling a little defensive.

“So….whose babies are those?” asked Mark, in a confused and vague way.

“MINE, you fool.” Barked Kelly, in a tone of voice that surprised even her and started a few people standing near by.

“You’re….?” stammered Mark, suddenly looking like a lost little boy.

Go ahead, Mark, say it. I’m BIG and if I get any bigger I won’t be able to move…..thought Kelly. But Mark seemed to back down.

“Didn’t I see you only a few months before today…?” said Mark, now really groping for some conversation piece.

Kelly suddenly very tired of this. She really didn’t want to hurt Mark but her biggest concern was this could be a broadcast item to the rest of the world. She settled down a little bit and said.

“Actually, Mark, it’s been several months” continued Kelly, “the father and I…couldn’t get the relationship to work so I’ve been living on my own. We’re working on things. What have you been up to?”



“Not much” replied Mark and then Kelly heard what sounded like music to her ears” I’m leaving tomorrow morning for Arizona. My uncle has gotten me a job with a developer out there.”

“WOW, what a relief!” responded Kelly, but seeing Mark looking confused quickly added, “ I mean…for you that is, getting a good job like that…out of the area…so soon. Anyway good luck, it’s nice out there.”

Mark stepped closer to Kelly, as if to kiss her, but decided not to. He said a quick goodbye and hurried away. Kelly felt like she had dodged a bullet and as quickly as she could she left the mall. As she crossed the parking lot she could see Doug, the stranger from before, a few cars away. He smiled and then Kelly swore that she saw…a gleam in his eye? Kelly was feeling a little spooked and settled into her car, started it up and left the mall.
12211221.title: Kelly meets Jasmine

122112212.content:
8

Kelly raced away from the mall and the jumble of thoughts came back into her head came back. Clearly running into Mark was an indication that she had little time to deal with her new situation but needed to use that time to come up with an explanation. The whole thing with this guy Doug was weird. It was almost as if, well, it was meant for her to meet him. Her roommate Rory would be back tomorrow and after dealing with her she would have to put together a plan of attack for, well, until the baby or babies arrived.

Parking her car she grabbed her bags and waddled to her building. For some reason she was unconcerned about being seen in her “blessed” state. Fortunately nobody was around so she was able to make it into her building. The stairs were a challenge with her immensely swollen, gravid body and the makeshift outfit she was wearing was bothering her. Exhausted, she finally made it to her unit and unlocked the door.

After carrying her bags to the bedroom Kelly changed into one of the maternity outfits she bought. Kelly undressed herself and paused to look in the mirror. She couldn’t resist noticing that she really looked….amazing. Her belly was large and taut with few stretch marks. Her boobs looked even bigger than ever and when she fondled herself she felt some milk moving around inside of them. But her legs and butt looked totally unaffected by the pregnancy, she was still lean and firm in those area. Rubbing herself she suddenly felt a kick and the tears came quickly. She was accepting this; this was inevitable. Unless they chose otherwise women who become pregnant can’t really become UN-pregnant.

Refocusing herself like the professional girl she was she put her maternity bra on and fit her big, swollen and tender boobs into the bra. Rousting through her bags she found some stretch pants and a print maternity top. When she looked in her top drawer she pulled out a pair of panties and, a bit less awkwardly than earlier, she put a pair of panties on and finished dressing herself. Looking in the mirror she quietly congratulated herself for doing a decent job.

Kelly cleared away her bed and, there they were, the magic panties. The allure was still there, Kelly smiled thinking that the panties might have a mind of their own. But the woman had enough on her mind and wasn’t going to go there. She picked the panties up and did something she hadn’t done previously; look at them closely. Kelly was always a young woman in a hurry but she had a fair amount of time on her hands now. Turning the panties over she felt an almost sensual vibration come out of them. The purplish color almost radiated slowly and, involuntarily, Kelly began to rub her big belly with one hand.

Then she noticed it.

Tucked up under the string band was stamped, in small letters, the number “22.”
Now what the heck did the number “22” mean? It wasn’t an inspection stamp; she had done some design work in the advertising business for clothing lines and inspection stamps that she remembered didn’t look like this. Suddenly a bit of a chill went through Kelly, so much so that her huge pregnant body shivered. This is a question I don’t need to answer now, she thought and in one motion opened her underwear drawer and tossed the panties in. Then she waddled out of her bedroom.

9

Kelly went to her kitchen and poured herself a glass of milk. She noticed that she and Rory had about three days worth of groceries left so that was OK for the moment. Waddling to her Living Room she sat down heavily in her couch and started to think. What to do first? Call her sister? Call her parents? Schedule an appointment with an obstetrician? Ironically work was the least of her worries. She had been telecommuting lately as her office was being downsized and a lot of the employees had either been transferred or laid off. Kelly had some outside clients and could maybe just slip out of the firm without even meeting with anyone. But the family and friends, along with neighbors would be, well, tough to come up with an explanation for her condition.

Kelly locked at her clock and realized it was around 12:30 PM. She realized how long a day this had been and suddenly she realized how hungry she was. She hefted her huge body out of the couch and waddled into the kitchen area. A smile came to her face as she wondered how many she was eating for. The panties had a strange effect on her besides her unwanted condition. She wondered if this thing could channel thoughts and dreams and she had been thinking about her sister and her triplets. Noticing how big she was and having no idea how far along she was she wondered if she was carrying triplets as well.

Kelly made a sandwich along with a salad and finished them almost in one breath. Still feeling hungry she had some fruit as well. Standing up from her kitchen table she still felt a little hungry and belched slightly. She thought about some ice cream (with pickles?) but decided against it. Returning to her living Room she sat down heavily in the couch again and grabbed the channel changer. Kelly turned on the TV and flipped through to a movie.

The exhaustion of carrying her big belly around slowly caught up to Kelly and she faded off to sleep.

“I had a feeling you’d come back here” said the young teenage girl.

“I would like to talk with you” Kelly responded.

Kelly stirred a bit but didn’t wake up. In the background the movie droned on.

“I have a lot of questions” said Kelly

“I have a lot of answers.” Said….

Kelly stirred a little more but still didn’t wake up. It was strange. The dreams were vivid and real but she was still feeling rested.

“I love you…I love you” panted Kelly as Doug’s hands fondled her.

“You are so beautiful”….Doug responded.

“How can you say that?...I’m a big blimp…”said Kelly

“That’s your beauty!!” Responded Doug in a heavy, panting voice. “Your big belly and big milk filled boobs…you are so awesome!!!”

“Always had a thing for you” murmured Rory.” Always had a thing for you”

“What…Rory, what are you doing” replied Kelly.

Kelly stirred awake and sat up in her couch. She was startled to see she had slept nearly two hours. The movie was ending and it was close to three o’clock. She slowly pieced the dreams together but the first one stood out. Of course!!! The yard sale where she got these panties!!! Perhaps the answer was there. But this was a teenage girl and what would she know about this issue.

Kelly pulled herself to her feet and waddled to her bathroom. After a quick pit stop she waddled to her closet. In spite of the condition she was in she had to go over to where the girl lived and get this worked out. She threw on her wind breaker and headed out the door. Her gait was slow but she pushed herself going down the stairs. Stopping at the first floor she caught her breath and headed out the door. Then as she turned toward the parking she realized the “reveal” had begun. Standing in front of her was Cathy Bryant.

Cathy’s expression was a sight to behold. Her eyes were bugging straight out of her head and she was stammering “Kelly…you’re….you’re…”

Kelly wanted no part of this; she was on a mission.

“Cathy” replied Kelly as calmly and professionally as possible, “Can we talk about this later? Oh, and I will look at the proposal.”

Without further ado Kelly turned and waddled out to the parking lot.
122112212.title: Kelly returns home

1221122121.content:
10.

Settling herself in her car Kelly started the engine and pulled out of the parking lot. Yes, the “reveal” had begun. Kelly had this feeling the news would be all over the complex quickly but that wasn’t something she wanted to address now. She needed to find this teenage girl and try to get some answers. It was late in a day which had been the longest of her life it seemed and she was quite tired. This was a pain getting used to her condition and she wanted to go to bed but she wanted answers first.

The baby or babies stirred inside of her and she suddenly felt a surge of tears in her eyes. Calming down she tried to play out scenarios in her head but she realized that would be no good that life would have to be played out slowly. Take your time, she said to herself, take your time.

Kelly found her way to the area where she thought the girl lived. It was about twenty minutes away. Driving slowly up the street she finally recognized the house, noting a few play items outside. She parked her car and slowly hefted her big bellied body out of her car. Slowly she waddled up the front walk to the door. The neighborhood was eerily quiet.

Hesitating, she rang the doorbell. A few minutes went by and then she heard some steps behind the door. She thought she saw someone peek through the window and then there was jiggling of the locks. Then the door opened.

Standing in front of Kelly was a teenage girl a little over 5’2” tall. She had jet black hair, pretty green eyes and was wearing cut off jeans and a T-shirt. The shirt emphasized a fairly large chest. The girl looked at Kelly up and down and slowly smiled. There was an awareness here.

“Hi,” said the young pleasantly, “I’m Jasmine. Can I help you with something?”

Kelly hesitated. Finally she said “ My name is Kelly. I was here about a week ago for yard sale. Do you remember me?

“I think so, “ said the teenager, hesitatingly, as if she was a little unsure of her ground. But there was a level of knowledge she betrayed as she eyed Kelly’s hugely pregnant body. “Would you….like to come in? You look like you need to sit down.”

“OK,” said Kelly. She waddled into the house. The house was a fairly non-descript looking place, the living room wasn’t large and sparsely furnished. Jasmine lead Kelly to a sizable couch and Kelly lowered herself onto it.

“Would you like something to drink or eat,” Jasmine said softly. Kelly seemed to react to the tone which read how-many-are-you-eating-for but she contained herself and said, “Yes, something cold, like…water”

“Fine,” said Kelly coolly. Jasmine left the room. Kelly looked around but couldn’t really see anything other than a start-up for a young couple. Kelly couldn’t wait to meet the boyfriend or husband, Wow, another set of kicks, the babies (?) were really active.

Jasmine returned with a glass of water and set it down in front of Kelly and sat down next to her on the couch.

After a few awkward seconds Jasmine smiled a strangely furtive smile and said, “So….when are you due? You look like you could pop any second now.”

Kelly felt anger surge within her but steadied herself after feeling a couple of more kicks. “I don’t know, Jasmine,” she said firmly, “because until 24 hours ago I wasn’t even pregnant.”

“Really?” said Jasmine, with an almost casual surprise in her voice. “What happened?”

Kelly was really ready to lose it. She started to open her mouth and, damn, if there wasn’t another set of kicks. It’s almost like the baby inside of her was controlling her.

“Jasmine, I think you and I need to have a serious talk.” Began Kelly, “ I need you to focus on this. I think it’s important.”

Jasmine seemed to understand and a little maturity seemed to set in.

“Go ahead” said Jasmine quietly, “How can I help you”

Kelly hesitated. She really didn’t know how to handle this so she just finally jumped in.

“When I was here for your yard sale” said Kelly, directly, “ did you?...I mean, could you….Did you put a pair of panties in my bag when I was leaving?”

Jasmine smiled and then looked away. She started to answer and then stopped.

“Jasmine” said Kelly a little more firmly, “I really need to know this”

“Ahhh…yeah, I did” replied Jasmine, “I guess…you put them on. And…I guess they worked….sort of. Like they did with you…in your condition.”

“Did you wear them at all?” said Kelly, suddenly feeling a little less angry.

“I did. I picked them up at a yard sale and brought them home.” Said Jasmine, slowly getting some momentum to her story, “ I kind of stole them from a yard sale and brought them home. They were in a box called Petrofile panties or something.”

“What happed after that?” asked Kelly.

“Well, I put them on and went to bed” continued Jasmine, “ I woke the next day feeling….well…kind of horny” Jasmine seemed to shrink a bit at the word but had this devilish little smile on here face, “ and also I noticed that I was …well…”

“You were pregnant” stated Kelly rather bluntly.

Again Jasmine seemed to shrink in her seat. She looked away and then looked back. “Yeah, she said, I kind of realized I was pregnant.” She smiled quickly and said nothing more.

“So what happened after that?” asked Kelly.

“Well, it’s all a blur. I went out and picked up this guy I knew, Billy. While I’m wearing the panties I’m slowly getting bigger and bigger.” Continued Jasmine, speaking in kind of a rapid fire teenage speak, “ We stayed together that night and when I woke the next morning I was as big…well, not as big as you…but I’m big as a house. So the next thing you know I gave birth to a baby girl”

“That day!!?!!” said Kelly, rather shocked.

“Yup” said Jasmine, with a level of casualness that stunned Kelly, “that day. As a matter of fact if you turn around…you’ll see my daughter.”
1221122121.title: Kelly goes to meet Jasmine

12211221211.content:
Kelly awkwardly swung around in her seat and was absolutely stunned at what she saw. Standing in front of her was a teenage girl not much younger than Jasmine. She had a lot of Jasmine’s skin color and features but her hair was lighter, almost blonde in color. Her eyes were a piercing blue and she smiled revealing a perfect row of teeth.

She was also hugely pregnant.

Kelly thought she had enough shock value for the day but it looked like there was more in store. The big bellied teen waddled slowly over and stood in front of Jasmine and Kelly.

“Shawna, this is Kelly,” said Jasmine softly.

“Nice to meet you,” said the teenage girl in an odd, somewhat flat voice that didn’t give off a lot of emotion. Jasmine seemed to give a quick head signal and the girl awkwardly extended her hand. Kelly shook it quickly. Shawna then stepped back. For a few minutes there was an awkward silence. Finally Jasmine said, “Shawna, why do you go back to your room and relax and read that book I gave you.”

“Yes, mom” Shawna said and slowly turned her bellied body away. A few more minutes of silence went by. Kelly then turned to Jasmine and was surprised to see her crying softly. Slowly at first but then almost in a torrent the words came out.

“This has become a nightmare. A…a few months ago…I was just a teenage cheerleader. Now…now I’m a mother. She’s…she’s,” Jasmine stopped, and Kelly, surprisingly, put a hand on Jasmine’s shoulder, “I don’t know… special or something.” Jasmine stopped, her crying too much.

Kelly felt both sympathetic and confused. She had come with an agenda but now that was all scrambled up.

“When did Shawna put the panties on?” asked Kelly.

“I think it was about two weeks ago,” answered Jasmine, regaining some of her composure.

“So she’s been pregnant for about two weeks and hasn’t given birth but you…”Kelly started to say.

“I know, I know it’s crazy. I popped her out in one night.” Responded Jasmine,” So…wow….what do you think this means?”

Kelly didn’t how to respond. By now she was thinking that maybe the panties so stimulated Jasmine that she literally went through the nine months in a day but her daughter’s pregnancy was, well, moving along at a certain and more relaxed pace as was Kelly’s. Kelly tried to stay calm and moved on.

“Jasmine,” began Kelly, “You said your daughter was…special. What do mean by that?”

“Well, it’s like trying to educate a child very quickly,” replied Jasmine,” It’s like she’s real bright and takes it in quickly, y’know, like reading and stuff. Like I gave a book of algebra problems I worked in when I was a freshman and told her to look through them. I figured it would take her weeks but the next day she had answered about five chapters and was working on the sixth. It was the weirdest thing I had ever seen.”

Kelly didn’t say anything. She was thinking that this child was some kind of, well, she didn’t know. Kelly wasn’t a scientist or a doctor and so couldn’t really figure this out on her own.

“Does Shawna go to school” asked Kelly.

“No…Billy and I don’t know how to handle this”, replied Jasmine, “You can see she’s a little ….awkward”

“Have you taken her to a doctor or specialist?” asked Kelly

“No…we probably should,” Jasmine responded looking a little shame faced.

Kelly was suddenly very tired and it was clear that, instead of working on the issue for her and getting the answers she needed, she was counseling a young woman who stumbled into something big time and had no control of the events that followed. Jasmine seemed to drift off into her thoughts.

“Look, Jasmine,” said Kelly, “this is all very confusing to me and I guess you as well. Thank you for your time and” Kelly reached into her bag and pulled out one of her business cards,” if you think of anything else give me a call.”

“OK” said Jasmine, “Thanks for listening to me.”

Jasmine helped Kelly lift her heavily pregnant body out of the chair. Kelly waddled out of the living room and turned to Jasmine and said goodbye.

“Say” began Jasmine, “ If you need an obstetrician…I mean, I think you will need one.”

Kelly smiled faintly and told Jasmine she’d call her. Kelly headed down the walkway to her car. Getting in, she began to tear up again, feeling like the answer to this was as far away as before.

Then she noticed the car.

A sedan drove past her. Kelly looked in the car and could swear she saw the guy Doug she met at the mall earlier. A chill went through her but the car drove away and made a left at the next corner. Kelly caught her breath, started her car and drove home.
12211221211.title: Kelly meets the daughter

12213.content: Jordan is very attractive twenty five year old woman. She had a pair of J-cup breasts with an ass to match. Jordan didn't like to flaunt her assets though. She was happy being a simple secretary. Not that she was stupid, but she just loved talking phone calls for people.

1222.content:
